title: Ticket #4551: Windows user reports corruption of job queue on restart
description:
Support user reports 

Every time someone reboots a windows box that has a schedd running, it corrupts the job queue. Seems to happen even if they have no jobs running!

07/16/14 09:48:33 (pid:7604) WARNING: Encountered corrupt log record 111 (byte offset 43509)
07/16/14 09:48:33 (pid:7604) Lines following corrupt log record 111 (up to 3):
07/16/14 09:48:33 (pid:7604)     103 02008.-1 Args "-REDACTED"
07/16/14 09:48:33 (pid:7604)     103 02008.-1 TargetType "Machine"
07/16/14 09:48:33 (pid:7604)     103 02008.-1 TransferIn false
07/16/14 09:48:33 (pid:7604) ERROR "Error: corrupt log record 111 (byte offset 43509) occurred inside closed transaction, recovery failed" at line 1153 in file c:\condor\execute\dir_12868\userdir\src\condor_utils\classad_log.cpp
07/16/14 09:48:33 (pid:7604) Cron: Killing all jobs

So far, we have not been able to reproduce this problem. It seems broken that the log does not show the actual corrupt line of the log - so that at least will be fixed.
check_ins: 2014-Aug-25 15:09   Check-in [41029]: add test app to validate the job queue log in support of fixing #4551 ===VersionHistory:None=== no user visible changes. (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
